channel.title: Encryption on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Encryption on Deuts Log

item.title: Enclosed Private Notes
item.description:
Enclosed Private Notes

Minimalistic web app designed for sending private and secure notes.
A better looking alternative to Privatebin, just can’t find a way to set pastes/notes to never expire. Yes
item.content:encoded:
Enclosed Private Notes

Minimalistic web app designed for sending private and secure notes.
A better looking alternative to Privatebin, just can’t find a way to set pastes/notes to never expire. Yes

item.title: OpenPGP Form Encryption for WordPress – WordPress plugin | WordPress.org
item.description:
OpenPGP Form Encryption for WordPress – WordPress plugin | WordPress.org

OpenPGP public key encryption for any textarea with a shortcode button.
item.content:encoded:
OpenPGP Form Encryption for WordPress – WordPress plugin | WordPress.org

OpenPGP public key encryption for any textarea with a shortcode button.

item.title: Ente - Private cloud storage for your photos, videos and more
item.description:
Ente - Private cloud storage for your photos, videos and more

Protect your photos and videos with Ente - a secure, cross-platform, open source, encrypted photo storage app. Automatic backups, end-to-end encryption, collaborative albums, family plans, free trial, library-sync, 1-click import, human support, locked photos, live photos, descriptions, private sharing, search and more.
item.content:encoded:
Ente - Private cloud storage for your photos, videos and more

Protect your photos and videos with Ente - a secure, cross-platform, open source, encrypted photo storage app. Automatic backups, end-to-end encryption, collaborative albums, family plans, free trial, library-sync, 1-click import, human support, locked photos, live photos, descriptions, private sharing, search and more.

item.title: Bubka 2FAuth
item.description:
Bubka 2FAuth

A Web app to manage your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) accounts and generate their security codes
item.content:encoded:
Bubka 2FAuth

A Web app to manage your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) accounts and generate their security codes

item.title: Picocrypt: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.
item.description:
Picocrypt: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.

A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool. - Picocrypt/Picocrypt
At least, there’s no need for admin privileges to use this application.
item.content:encoded:
Picocrypt: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.

A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool. - Picocrypt/Picocrypt
At least, there’s no need for admin privileges to use this application.

item.title: PhiTux/DailyTxT: Encrypted Diary Web-App
item.description:
PhiTux/DailyTxT: Encrypted Diary Web-App

Encrypted Diary Web-App. Contribute to PhiTux/DailyTxT development by creating an account on GitHub.
I don’t know, this might be an option for encrypted notes. I’m not just so sure about the encryption method.
item.content:encoded:
PhiTux/DailyTxT: Encrypted Diary Web-App

Encrypted Diary Web-App. Contribute to PhiTux/DailyTxT development by creating an account on GitHub.
I don’t know, this might be an option for encrypted notes. I’m not just so sure about the encryption method.
